verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that certain <S%H582><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Are you come <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of me? As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will not be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you.

Will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> will you judge <S%H8199><s%> them? cause them to know <S%H3045><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and made myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%>

In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to them, to bring <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that I had espied <S%H8446><s%> for them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> lands: <S%H776><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I to them, Cast <S%H7993><s%> you away every man <S%H376><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and defile <S%H2930><s%> not yourselves with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me, and would <S%H14><s%> not listen <S%H8085><s%> to me: they did not every man <S%H376><s%> cast <S%H7993><s%> away the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I will pour <S%H8210><s%> out my fury <S%H2534><s%> on them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But I worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they were, in whose <S%H853><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I made myself known <S%H3045><s%> to them, in bringing <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
Why I caused them to go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and showed <S%H3045><s%> them my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them.

Moreover <S%H1571><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> them my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> to be a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and them, that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> they walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them; and my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> they greatly <S%H3966><s%> polluted: <S%H2490><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I would pour <S%H8210><s%> out my fury <S%H2534><s%> on them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to consume <S%H3615><s%> them.

But I worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> them out.

Yet also <S%H1571><s%> I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would not bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1958><s%> is the glory of all <S%H3605><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> but polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> for their heart <S%H3820><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Nevertheless my eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> them from destroying <S%H7843><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> did I make <S%H6213><s%> an end <S%H3615><s%> of them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

But I said <S%H559><s%> to their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Walk <S%H3212><s%> you not in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> observe <S%H8104><s%> their judgments, <S%H4941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with their idols: <S%H1544><s%>
I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them;

And hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths; <S%H7676><s%> and they shall be a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you, that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Notwithstanding the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me: they walked <S%H1980><s%> not in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> he shall even live <S%H2425><s%> in them; they polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I would pour <S%H8210><s%> out my fury <S%H2534><s%> on them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Nevertheless I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> and worked <S%H6213><s%> for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> that it should not be polluted <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought <S%H3318><s%> them forth. <S%H3318><s%>

I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to them also <S%H1571><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries; <S%H776><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they had not executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> but had despised <S%H3988><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and had polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were after <S%H310><s%> their fathers' <S%H1><s%> idols. <S%H1544><s%>
Why I gave <S%H5414><s%> them also <S%H1571><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not good, <S%H2896><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> whereby they should not live; <S%H2421><s%>

And I polluted <S%H2930><s%> them in their own gifts, <S%H4979><s%> in that they caused to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire all <S%H3605><s%> that opens <S%H6363><s%> the womb, <S%H7356><s%> that I might make them desolate, <S%H8074><s%> to the end <S%H4616><s%> that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> have blasphemed <S%H1442><s%> me, in that they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against me.

For when I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to them, then they saw <S%H7200><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the thick <S%H5687><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering: <S%H7133><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> also they made <S%H7760><s%> their sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> and poured <S%H5258><s%> out there <S%H8033><s%> their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings.

Then I said <S%H559><s%> to them, What <S%H4100><s%> is the high <S%H1116><s%> place whereunto <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you go? <S%H935><s%> And the name <S%H8034><s%> whereof is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Why <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Are you polluted <S%H2930><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers? <S%H1><s%> and commit <S%H2181><s%> you prostitution <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their abominations? <S%H8251><s%>

For when you offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> when you make your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> you pollute <S%H2930><s%> yourselves with all <S%H3605><s%> your idols, <S%H1544><s%> even to this day: <S%H3117><s%> and shall I be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will not be inquired of by you.

And that which comes <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> your mind <S%H7307><s%> shall not be at all, that you say, <S%H559><s%> We will be as the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> as the families <S%H4940><s%> of the countries, <S%H776><s%> to serve <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

As I live, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with a stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured <S%H8210><s%> out, will I rule <S%H4427><s%> over you:

And I will bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from the people, <S%H5971><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with a stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured <S%H8210><s%> out.

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face. <S%H6440><s%>

Like as I pleaded <S%H8199><s%> with your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with you, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
And I will cause you to pass <S%H5674><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

And I will purge <S%H1305><s%> out from among you the rebels, <S%H4775><s%> and them that transgress <S%H6586><s%> against me: I will bring <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the country <S%H776><s%> where they sojourn, <S%H4033><s%> and they shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

As for you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> you, serve <S%H5647><s%> you every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> his idols, <S%H1544><s%> and hereafter <S%H310><s%> also, if <S%H518><s%> you will not listen <S%H8085><s%> to me: but pollute <S%H2490><s%> you my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> with your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> and with your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

For in my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them in the land, <S%H776><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> me: there <S%H8033><s%> will I accept <S%H7521><s%> them, and there <S%H8033><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> your offerings, <S%H8641><s%> and the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your oblations, <S%H4864><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your holy things.

I will accept <S%H7521><s%> you with your sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> when I bring <S%H3318><s%> you out from the people, <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein you have been scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>

And you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted <S%H5375><s%> up my hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> shall you remember <S%H2142><s%> your ways, <S%H1870><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your doings, <S%H5949><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you have been defiled; <S%H2930><s%> and you shall loathe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> your evils <S%H7451><s%> that you have committed. <S%H6213><s%>

And you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>when I have worked <S%H6213><s%> with you for my name's <S%H8034><s%> sake, <S%H4616><s%> not according to your wicked <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> nor according to your corrupt <S%H7843><s%> doings, <S%H5949><s%> O you house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H1870><s%> the south, <S%H8486><s%> and drop <S%H5197><s%> your word toward <S%H413><s%> the south, <S%H1864><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%> field; <S%H7704><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> to the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the south, <S%H5045><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will kindle <S%H3341><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in you, and it shall devour <S%H398><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H3892><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> in you, and every <S%H3605><s%> dry <S%H3002><s%> tree: <S%H6086><s%> the flaming <S%H3852><s%> flame <S%H7957><s%> shall not be quenched, <S%H3518><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> faces <S%H6440><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> to the north <S%H6828><s%> shall be burned <S%H6866><s%> therein.
And all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have kindled <S%H1197><s%> it: it shall not be quenched. <S%H3518><s%>
Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD! <S%H3069><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> of me, Does he not speak <S%H4911><s%> parables? <S%H4912><s%>
